trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> events related to cell and row operations.
trans-unit.target: 表示将处理的方法<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>与单元格和行的操作相关的事件。

trans-unit.source: DataGridViewCellEventHandler handles the following <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> events: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellClick> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripChanged> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellEndEdit> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellEnter> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextChanged> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellLeave> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseEnter> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseLeave> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellStyleChanged> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextChanged> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidated> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowEnter> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowLeave> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowValidated> When you create a DataGridViewCellEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: DataGridViewCellEventHandler 处理以下<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>事件:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellClick>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripChanged>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellEndEdit>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellEnter>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextChanged>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellLeave>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseEnter>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseLeave>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellStyleChanged>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextChanged>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidated>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowEnter>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowLeave>-<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowValidated>创建 DataGridViewCellEventHandler 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowValidated> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowLeave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowEnter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidated> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellStyleChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseLeave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseEnter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellLeave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellEnter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellEndEdit> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellClick> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，添加到事件的委托的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，称为每当发生该事件时，事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 事件和委托](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。
